text: The 2010–11 season was Queen of the South's ninth consecutive season in the Scottish First Division, having been promoted from the Scottish Second Division at the end of the 2001–02 season. Queens also competed in the Challenge Cup, League Cup and the Scottish Cup. ==First team transfers== *From end of 2009–10 season, to last match of season 2010–11 ===In=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%;width:95%; text- align:left" !Player !From !League !Fee |---- | Allan Johnston |Free agent | |Free (July 2010) |---- | Ryan Conroy |Celtic |SPL |Loan (August 2010) |---- | Colin McMenamin |Free agent | |Free (November 2010) |} ===Out=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%;width:95%; text- align:left" !Player !To !League !Fee |---- | Ryan Conroy |Celtic |SPL |Loan Return (December 2010) |} ==Squad (that played for first team)== ==Fixtures and results== ===Friendlies=== {| border="2" cellpadding="4" style="border- collapse:collapse; text-align:center; font-size:smaller;" |- style="background:#f0f6ff;" !Date !Opponents !Stadium !Result F -
